snippet: Controversial new measures to prohibit modeling agencies from hiring dangerously thin models came closer to passage Friday.
abstract: French National Assembly approves measure criminalizing use of dangerously thin models in fashion industry, practice that lawmakers say encourages pushes young girls toward anorexia; bill is included in overhaul of country's health care laws and would require doctors to declare models healthy in order to work.
lead_paragraph: Controversial new measures to prohibit modeling agencies from hiring dangerously thin models came closer to passage Friday.

headline.main: French Bill Barring Ultrathin Models Clears a Hurdle
headline.print_headline: French Bill on Anorexia and Models Passes a Test
